thread.title: TSS, Inc. Recognized As 2015 Dell Global Enterprise Technology Services Partner Of The Year
thread.title_full: TSS, Inc. Recognized As 2015 Dell Global Enterprise Technology Services Partner Of The Year

author: PRNW
title: TSS, Inc. Recognized As 2015 Dell Global Enterprise Technology Services Partner Of The Year
text:
ROUND ROCK, Texas , Sept.14, TSS, Inc. (OTCQB: TSSI), a data center and mission critical facilities and technology services company, is proud to announce it has been recognized as Dell's Global Enterprise Technology Services Partner of the Year, Americas Region for 2015.
The company was recognized for its industry-leading expertise and quality in delivering end-to-end data center lifecycle services including, white glove on premise and factory customer solutions reducing risk, complexity and cost for Dell customers.
The annual awards honor Dell service partners for delivering exemplary solutions for their customers during the past year. Award winners are selected from a group of nominations based on their commitment to broaden and enhance Dell's reach and operational excellence in expertly delivering end to end solutions that solve complex business issues. Overall, Dell has more than 180,000 partners worldwide.
"We are honored to receive the annual Partner of the Year Award, the second consecutive award from our longstanding partner, Dell. Delivering an unmatched suite of integrated capabilities across the data center lifecycle, reducing risk, complexity and cost in mission critical environments is a core mission of our organization," Anthony Angelini , Chief Executive Officer of TSS, stated. "I am proud of the efforts of our team. As we continue to move the company forward as a leading service organization in the rapidly evolving data center market, this type of recognition validates our ability to deliver superior value," Mr. Angelini continued.
The services and solutions delivered by TSS serve some of the most compute and data intensive customer operations in the OEM, Large Enterprise, Federal and High Performance Compute space requiring unparalleled industry experience and excellence in execution from the components on the server to the environment in which it resides.
About TSS, Inc.
TSS is a trusted single source provider of mission-critical planning, design, system integration, deployment, maintenance and evolution of data centers facilities and information infrastructure. TSS specializes in customizable end to end solutions powered by industry experts and innovative services that include technology consulting, engineering, design, construction, operations, facilities management, technology system installation and integration, as well as maintenance for traditional and modular data centers. www.totalsitesolutions.com or call 888-321-4877.
Forward Looking Statements
